results.headline: Heavy Metal (Movie)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Heavy Metal

results.summary_short: Gerald Potterton's animated film makes diverting entertainment, full of sex, mysticism, violence and science fiction, backed by a rock score performed by Black Sabbath, Blue Oyster Cult, Nazareth and many others.
